title: Lenovo ideapad 510 - Unboxing and Quick Look
description:
Thanks for watching the Lenovo ideapad 510 - Unboxing and Quick Look.

Lenovo ideapad 510 - Tech Specs

Processor 
Up to 7th Generation Intel® Core™ i7 Processor

Operating System 
Windows 10 Home

Graphics 
Integrated Intel® or
NVIDIA® GeForce® 940MX 2 GB / 4 GB(Optional)

Webcam / Microphone 
1MP with Dual Array Microphone

Memory 
Up to 12 GB DDR4

Storage 
Up to 2 TB HDD or
Up to 256 GB SSD or
128 GB SSD + 1 TB HDD

Audio 
2 x Harman Audio Certified Speakers

Battery 
30WHr or 39WHr;
**Up to 5 Hours Video Playback

Display 
Up to 15.6" FHD(Optional) (1920 x 1080) IPS

Dimensions (W x D x H) 
(mm) : 379 x 260 x 22.9
(inches) : 14.92" x 10.24" x 0.9"

Weight (with battery) 
Starting at ~4.8 lbs (~2.2 kg)

Colors 
Ebony Black
Chalk White

ODD 
Built-in DVD Drive
WLAN 
WiFi 802.11 a/c
LAN 
10/100/1000M Gigabit Ethernet
Bluetooth® 
Bluetooth® 4.1 Combo with WiFi Card

Ports 
2 x USB 3.0
1 x USB 2.0
3.5 mm Combo Audio Jack
1 x VGA
1 x HDMI™
1 x RJ45 Gigabit LAN
4-in-1 Card Reader (SD, SDHC, SDXC, MMC)
